text:
hey,

we can save test results, but it doesn't load when I load the test case again.
I checked the manual and FAQ and no found no instructions.
creator: azn_fuman@yahoo.ca
sebb@apache.org
text:
That's not the way it works.

Loading a test case does not reload the data.

Test Results need to be separately loaded by using the file browse button on the
Listener. Documentation was updated recently to clarify this
